analysis.description:
Reentrancy in EtheremonPayment.catchMonster (/unique_chucks/26/0xfec769e54c266de2bc3fa5df7d9f0fe2a1e39461.sol#295-328):
	External calls:
	- (class.classId,class.price,class.returnPrice,class.total,class.catchable) = data.getMonsterClass(_classId) (/unique_chucks/26/0xfec769e54c266de2bc3fa5df7d9f0fe2a1e39461.sol#304-308)
	- data.getMonsterDexSize(_trainer) > maxDexSize (/unique_chucks/26/0xfec769e54c266de2bc3fa5df7d9f0fe2a1e39461.sol#313-314)
	- objId = data.addMonsterObj(_classId,_trainer,_name) (/unique_chucks/26/0xfec769e54c266de2bc3fa5df7d9f0fe2a1e39461.sol#316)
	- value = getRandom(STAT_MAX,uint8(i),lastHunter) + data.getElementInArrayType(ArrayType.STAT_START,uint64(_classId),i) (/unique_chucks/26/0xfec769e54c266de2bc3fa5df7d9f0fe2a1e39461.sol#321-325)
	- data.addElementToArrayType(ArrayType.STAT_BASE,objId,value) (/unique_chucks/26/0xfec769e54c266de2bc3fa5df7d9f0fe2a1e39461.sol#325)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastHunter (/unique_chucks/26/0xfec769e54c266de2bc3fa5df7d9f0fe2a1e39461.sol#325)
class in EtheremonPayment.catchMonster (/unique_chucks/26/0xfec769e54c266de2bc3fa5df7d9f0fe2a1e39461.sol#303-304) is a local variable never initialiazed

EtheremonPayment.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/26/0xfec769e54c266de2bc3fa5df7d9f0fe2a1e39461.sol#257-263) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_sendTo,_amount) (/unique_chucks/26/0xfec769e54c266de2bc3fa5df7d9f0fe2a1e39461.sol#262-263)

EtheremonPayment.giveBattleBonus (/unique_chucks/26/0xfec769e54c266de2bc3fa5df7d9f0fe2a1e39461.sol#280-285) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_trainer,_amount) (/unique_chucks/26/0xfec769e54c266de2bc3fa5df7d9f0fe2a1e39461.sol#284-285)

EtheremonPayment.catchMonster (/unique_chucks/26/0xfec769e54c266de2bc3fa5df7d9f0fe2a1e39461.sol#295-328) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-data.addElementToArrayType(ArrayType.STAT_BASE,objId,value) (/unique_chucks/26/0xfec769e54c266de2bc3fa5df7d9f0fe2a1e39461.sol#325)

EtheremonPayment.catchMonster has external calls inside a loop:
	- value = getRandom(STAT_MAX,uint8(i),lastHunter) + data.getElementInArrayType(ArrayType.STAT_START,uint64(_classId),i) (/unique_chucks/26/0xfec769e54c266de2bc3fa5df7d9f0fe2a1e39461.sol#321-325)

EtheremonPayment.catchMonster has external calls inside a loop:
	- data.addElementToArrayType(ArrayType.STAT_BASE,objId,value) (/unique_chucks/26/0xfec769e54c266de2bc3fa5df7d9f0fe2a1e39461.sol#325)

EtheremonDataBase.totalMonster should be constant (/unique_chucks/26/0xfec769e54c266de2bc3fa5df7d9f0fe2a1e39461.sol#117)
